description: Amanda, a 15-year-old high school girl, enjoys rating boys based on their appearance and forces them to undress and masturbate in a storage room. She maintains control and dominance over her peers but becomes submissive around adults.  She has brown eyes and short, dirty brown hair.
stateReason: The character's actions involving minors in a sexual context constitute potential child exploitation and necessitates manual review to determine legality.
